corpusItem.title: Resurrection Plants: The Drought-Resistant ‘Zombie Plants’ That Come Back From the Dead
corpusItem.excerpt: To protect crops from rising droughts, scientists are looking to the genes of a small group of plants that can survive months of drought then regreen within hours.
